Delivering comprehensive capabilities in a way that's simple and intuitive, Tascent Enterprise Suite makes it easy to deploy and manage complete biometric identity systems. [ About Tascent Tascent Enterprise Suite] InSight One The next generation for high throughput iris recognition Access Data Sheet Watch the Video Access Data Sheet Delivering effortless, fast, and highly accurate biometric enrollment and identification, InSight One captures best-in-class iris and face biometrics in a sleek, elegant device. Designed for high throughput identification and verification, InSight One sets the stage for the future of travel, access, and identity. [ About Tascent InSight One] Tascent MX Mobile registration, identification, and verification. Evolved. Access Data Sheet Watch the Video Access Data Sheet The next generation of Tascent Mobile, Tascent MX combines the world's leading smartphone devices with advanced face, fingerprint, and iris biometrics to power enrollment and authentication. Smaller, more intuitive, more powerful, and now featuring a unique approach to multi-platform, multi-generation support. [ About Tascent Tascent MX] A modern approach to biometric identity systems Tascent Enterprise Suite represents a thoroughly modern approach to biometric identity software. Delivering comprehensive capabilities in a way that's simple and intuitive, Tascent Enterprise Suite makes it easy to deploy and manage complete biometric identity systems. The next generation for high throughput iris recognition Delivering effortless, fast, and highly accurate biometric enrollment and identification, InSight One captures best-in-class iris and face biometrics in a sleek, elegant device. Designed for high throughput identification and verification, InSight One sets the stage for the future of travel, access, and identity. Mobile registration, identification, and verification. Evolved. The next generation of Tascent Mobile, Tascent MX combines the world's leading smartphone devices with advanced face, fingerprint, and iris biometrics to power enrollment and authentication. Smaller, more intuitive, more powerful, and now featuring a unique approach to multi-platform, multi-generation support. Applications Travel Tascent's high throughput and mobile identity products deliver efficiency, safety, and personalized treatment for the wide range of use cases consistently encountered in air travel, from bag drop to VIP lounge to boarding and even in-flight. Border Management Tascent's iris recognition and multimodal biometric systems enable increased efficiency and decreased queues in high throughput border management environments while also supporting mobile applications in the air, on the ground, and in the field. Public Safety Positive identity confirmation using Tascent's multimodal high throughput and smartphone-based mobile biometric capabilities is helping to improve the safety, security, and efficiency of public safety organizations around the world. With a fully automated face and iris scan process supported by real-time feedback, InSight One captures high quality dual iris and face images in about 2 seconds at a standoff distance of 0.5 to 1.0 meters, creating an experience that is both appealing to users and well-suited to a wide variety of applications. Download the data sheet. InSight One's customizable LCD and LED user interface is seamlessly integrated into the precision-crafted aluminum enclosure, delivering a natural, unified, and visually-pleasing user experience. InSight One offers a convenient, comfortable way to capture high quality face and iris images that meet or exceed demanding ISO / ICAO standards for format and quality. See the tech specs. Tascent offers a variety of mounting options to enable tight integration of InSight One in desktop, e-Gate, and kiosk applications as well as custom color options to aesthetically match its surroundings. InSight One Self-Service Solutions InSight One's powerful and intuitive multimodal biometric capabilities are available in a variety of form factors to support a wide range of self-service applications. InSight One is available as an embeddable OEM module to provide robust iris and face biometric capabilities for kiosk and other self-service touchpoints. The InSight One OEM Module enables integrators to bring biometric enrollment, identification, and verification in self-service kiosks to enhance the experience and security of services provided. about InSight One Self-Service Solutions. With a fully automated face and iris scan process supported by real-time feedback, InSight One captures high quality dual iris and face images in about 2 seconds at a standoff distance of 0.5 to 1.0 meters, creating an experience that is both appealing to users and well-suited to a wide variety of applications. Download the data sheet. Tascent offers a variety of mounting options to enable tight integration of InSight One in desktop, e-Gate, and kiosk applications as well as custom color options to aesthetically match its surroundings. InSight One Self-Service Solutions InSight One's powerful and intuitive multimodal biometric capabilities are available in a variety of form factors to support a wide range of self-service applications. InSight One is available as an embeddable OEM module to provide robust iris and face biometric capabilities for kiosk and other self-service touchpoints. The InSight One OEM Module enables integrators to bring biometric enrollment, identification, and verification in self-service kiosks to enhance the experience and security of services provided. about InSight One Self-Service Solutions. Key features Compact form factor, world-class industrial design Simultaneous dual iris and face capture at a standoff distance of 0.5 to 1.0 meter Fully automated capture process supported by real-time feedback enables intuitive operation even for non-acclimated users On-demand face capture for multiple poses Based on patented technology, best-in-class iris imaging delivers superior accuracy even in challenging real-world environments Can be integrated as a secure locked-down network appliance or point-to-point USB peripheral Open architecture, standards-compliant design enables rapid integration and deployment with new or existing infrastructure Technical specifications 0.5 – 1.0 meter (1.6 – 3.3 ft) standoff distance Accommodates users from 1.2 to 2.1 meters (3.9 to 6.8 ft) high Iris images meet or exceed ISO 19794-6 and 29794-6 standards for format and image quality Face images meet or exceed ISO 19794-5 and 29794-5 image quality standards for format and image quality 2 second image dual iris + face capture LED-based illuminator is eye safe at all distances Fully configurable high resolution 5†LCD and integrated LED illlumination Optional 10,000 user on-board database PKI encryption with standard P12 or self-signed 1024 bit certificates SOAP over HTTPS and USB 2.0 interfaces FCC certified, CE (pending), UL Product Safety, IEC 64271 Eye Safety Compact form Cross-Platform / Cross-Generation Support Tascent M1 isn't bound to the form factor of a specific mobile device. Leveraging the OtterBox uniVERSE Case System, the same biometric peripheral can be used across multiple device form factors and generations. Easy Attach / Detach Powered by OtterBox uniVERSE and a USB Type-C connector, M1 can be robustly attached or simply detached with little effort. This makes it ideal for users who only need the advanced biometric capability of M1 on an intermittent basis. Single-Device Experience When connected, M1 provides a seamless, single device user experience, including an external USB Type-C port for passthrough charging. M1 is one of the most compact and portable mobile fingerprint solutions available. While lightweight, it is highly durable, meeting IP65 and MIL-STD-810G specifications for ingress and drop protection. M1 is extremely power efficient, enabling all-day use and supporting an ultra-low power standby mode when not in use. FAP 30 Non-Optical Fingerprint Featuring next-generation capacitive TFT technology, Tascent M1 delivers 500dpi imaging and fast capture in all lighting conditions. M1 is extremely power efficient, enabling all-day use and supporting an ultra-low power standby mode when not in use. Intuitive, High-Performance Biometric Capture The Tascent Mobile App and Tascent Mobile SDK provide intuitive guidance for face, fingerprint, biographic, and identity document capture for both operator and subject, resulting in superior biometric performance with minimal training. Intuitive, High-Performance Biometric Capture The Tascent Mobile App and Tascent Mobile SDK provide intuitive guidance for face, fingerprint, biographic, and identity document capture for both operator and subject, resulting in superior biometric performance with minimal training. Benefits of smartphone-based mobile biometrics include: Intuitive and simple user interface Integrated WiFi, 4G, and LTE communications High quality GPS location tracking Vast array of relevant off-the-shelf and custom apps and enterprise-grade security and device management tools Benefits of smartphone-based mobile biometrics include: Intuitive and simple user interface Intuitive and simple user interface Integrated WiFi, 4G, and LTE communications Integrated WiFi, 4G, and LTE communications High quality GPS location tracking High quality GPS location tracking Vast array of relevant off-the-shelf and custom apps and enterprise-grade security and device management tools Vast array of relevant off-the-shelf and custom apps and enterprise-grade security and device management tools A Perfect Match Tascent Enterprise Suite works seamlessly with Tascent Mobile – unleashing the full potential of its leading-edge capabilities. about Tascent Enterprise Suite Tascent Enterprise Suite works seamlessly with Tascent Mobile – unleashing the full potential of its leading-edge capabilities. about Tascent Enterprise Suite Custom Apps for Tailored Applications The Tascent Mobile SDK combines all of the tools necessary for developers to rapidly integrate the world-class biometric capabilities of the Tascent Mobile Product Family into custom software solutions that run on Android and iOS devices. Going beyond typical software development kits, the Tascent Mobile SDK incorporates the capture experience from the Tascent Mobile App in the form of Encapsulated Application Elements that developers can drop-in to their custom applications. Custom Apps for Tailored Applications The Tascent Mobile SDK combines all of the tools necessary for developers to rapidly integrate the world-class biometric capabilities of the Tascent Mobile Product Family into custom software solutions that run on Android and iOS devices. Going beyond typical software development kits, the Tascent Mobile SDK incorporates the capture experience from the Tascent Mobile App in the form of Encapsulated Application Elements that developers can drop-in to their custom applications.
